verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, You’re beautiful Your face is all I seek For since Your eyes Are on this child Your grace abounds to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to take Your word and shine it all around. But first help me to just live it Lord. And when I’m doing well, help me to never seek a crown. For my reward is giving glory to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, please light the fire That once burned bright and clear Restore the flame of my first love That burned with holy fear.{/lang-eng}
